KI retest **Device used:** Xiaomi RedMi Note 10 / Android 12 **App Component:** Other ## Action Performed: Precondition: The user has logged out STR: 1. Long-press on the Android app 2. Select the Manual Create option 3. Log in to the app using the Google method ## Expected Result: User is logged in. The NewDot manual flow display can create a manual expense normally ## Actual Result: Nothing happend ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9938cb7c-5b93-46af-9b9d-787d2a54dd64 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.78-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/75886 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** isjdsoijsojnsiojisndj@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution **Device used:** Samsung Galaxy S25 FE / Android 16 **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: 1. body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.78-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** N/A - new feature, doesn't exist in prod **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/76998 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** snoidjsoijosijnoidsjo@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution **Device used:** Mac 26.1 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Bug 1: Precondition: - Submission frequency is set to Instantly. 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to workspace chat. 3. Create two expenses. 4. Go to Reports > Reports (optional). 5. Open the report. 6. Select two expenses via checkbox. 7. Click More > Reject. 8. Enter reason and click Reject expenses. Bug 2: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to workspace chat. 3. Create an expense. 4. Go to Reports > Reports. 5. Open expense report. 6. Click on the header > Delete expense. 7. Delete the expense. ## Expected Result: RHP will close. ## Actual Result: Not here page opens after rejecting expenses/deleting expense. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/be0b5c0b-180f-4265-953f-bda9e4b03db6 https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9f11bb7f-ab6b-4031-8483-40f4dde69f84 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.74-12 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/75988 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** agexptest+pr121225@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution **Device used:** Windows 11/ Chrome, Samsung S23FE/ Android 16, iPhone 13 Mini/ iOS 26.1 **App Component:** Left Hand Navigation (LHN) ## Action Performed: 1. Navigate to https://staging.new.expensify.com/ 2. Go to FAB > Start chat 3. Add two users to the group > Next 4. Change the group name to "< >" 5. Click on Start group ## Expected Result: "< >" is shown as the group name in the LHN. ## Actual Result: "Hidden" is shown as the group name in the LHN. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/525a8281-2f47-4434-9f7a-ff0eb4e2d956 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
